panel.title: Panels
panel.alert-title: There is an issue while showing this panel.
panel.alert-text: Usually this can be resolved by reset the panel. If that didn't help, please click \"More Info\".
panel.alert-contact: Below is the issue detail. It can be given to our Customer Support to help resolve the issue. Use the \"Help\" button at top right corner to contact us.

workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.add-max: You have reached the maximum amount of workspaces (5). To create new workspace you must first remove one of yours.
workspace.remove-current: You cannot delete currently selected workspace. Please switch to another workspace first.
workspace.remove-text: Are you sure want to delete this workspace? Workspace cannot be restored after delete.
workspace.share-help: Use the code below to share your workspace (Create New Workspace > Use code).

alias.title: Aliases
alias.help: Aliases are dynamic values that can be changed once here and will applied to all assigned panels.

product-manage.help-1: Active (check) a product allow you to see its activities and trade with it.
product-manage.help-2: Deactive (uncheck) a product will hide it from the UI without affect any related trading activities (if any).

order.title: Orders
order.leverage-help: With great leverage level come great risks. Please ensure that you fully understand the risk before trading at this level.
order.direction-help:
One-Direction: can only submit buy or sell orders.
Two-Direction: can submit both sides of orders.
Net-Out: opposite orders net out each other.

order-error.user-not-enough-fund: You do not have enough funds in your account.
order-error.user-not-enough-free-balance: You do not have enough free balance in your account.
order-error.user-have-another-direction-trade: You are having position in the other direction.
order-error.price-bigger-than-min: Order price must be greater than 0.
order-error.user-free-margin-below-tolerance-level: Free margin is below tolerance level.
order-error.order-disc-quantity-more-than-10th-quant: Disclose Quantity must be greater than 10th of Quantity.
order-error.order-invalid-multi-currency-code: Placing order with this account is not supported.
order-error.order-multicurrency-or-collateral-only-u: Margin trading must be used to place Order with this Product and Account combination.
order-error.user-insufficient-loan-liquidity: Sorry, lending pool cannot satisfy your trade quantity right now.

order-add.confirm-message: Please review your order details below
order-add.success-message: Order has been created successfully. Please check in your Orders panel.

position-error.stop-loss-larger-than-market-ask: Position stop loss must be larger than market ask.
position-error.stop-loss-smaller-than-market-bid: Position stop loss must be smaller than market bid.
position-error.take-profit-larger-than-market-bid: Position take profit must be larger than market bid.
position-error.take-profit-smaller-than-market-ask: Position take profit must be smaller than market ask.
position-error.value-should-smaller-than-open-quantity: Value should smaller than open quantity.
position-error.you-do-not-have-enough-balance-to-claim-: You do not have enough balance to claim this position.

position-overview-error.multiple: Overview information is not available for multiple products at the moment.
position-overview-error.bitmex: Overview information is not available for Futures products at the moment.
